Description:
Neat as a pin
Located in a well sort after Cul De Sac known as Eden Court in Kangaroo Flat, this two bedroom townhouse won't be on the market for long. Perfectly maintained, the home features two large bedrooms, one with built in robes and the other with a large walk in robe that leads to the three piece bathroom that has dual access and a separate toilet.  The lounge room is very spacious with a large window overlooking the front garden, a gas wall furnace and air conditioner. The kitchen has plenty of bench and cupboard space, as well as a double stainless steel sink, dishwasher, gas stove and electric oven. The dining area opens up to the undercover alfresco area that runs the length of the home, perfect for entertaining, the alfresco is lined with multiple shrubs for protection from the weather. Also in the courtyard is a paved garden shed, but the real bonus is the additional multipurpose room adjoining the secure garage with auto roller door ( a site plan can be found on this website or emailed through on request ). With the benefit of reasonable owners corporate rates of only $45 per quarter and the community feel, you wont be able to go past this gem so call our friendly sales team to inspect today.
Insights: 4/18 Lowe Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet Tranquil Location
This one is very private! Positioned close to shops, train station, and schools, this 3 bedroom home is ideally located at the end of View Street beside the creek, with only 1 neighbor.
The stunning polished timber floors and a dynamic floorplan create the perfect home!
The large kitchen with 900mm stainless appliances is a great space to create that home cooked meal, while the flow through living areas from the lounge, meals and family room, provide functional areas to mingle with family and friends. Off the large family room is a huge undercover outdoor area creating a perfect space to relax or entertain.
The master bedroom includes a large built in robe and overlooks the picturesque back garden.
A built in wood heater provides a cozy element through the colder months, while the reverse cycle split system provides comfort for the summer.
The laundry includes storage with plenty of room for your washer and dryer.
The well-equipped bathroom with a separate toilet room is very handy.
At the rear of the property is a gorgeous garden providing a further place to entertain family and friends while listening to the singing birds and frogs from the creek reserve.
Several sheds in the back yard provide ample storage.
If you are looking for a well-priced home with the lot in a quiet location, look no further.

Description:
Small Dollars, Big Sense
This 3 year old home is well suited to all types of buyers, with a free flowing floorplan this neat & tidy home offers 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & low maintenance living. Currently tenanted & returning a strong $300pw makes it a wise choice for investors however if your downsizing or looking to secure your first home then vacant possession is an option. Features include gas ducted heating, split system cooling, single auto garage with internal access and a social open plan living space with functional kitchen.
Inspection is a must to truly appreciate what is on offer here so give me a call today to take a look!

Description:
MUST SEE
What an opportunity for those wanting to enter the housing market for the first time, or invest in today's appealing real estate hub in Kangaroo Flat!
Being the rear dwelling of 3, and on its own title with ELEVATED views over High Street, you will find this affordable, stylish and unique three bedroom home.
Freshly painted throughout, it is ready for you to pack your bags and call it home.
Enjoy the openness of the floorplan, with plenty of space in the kitchen/meals and living area, and its own split-system to provide all year comfort.
The main bedroom offers his and her walk-in robe and the bonus of an ensuite, while the two remaining bedrooms both include built-in robes.
The fully landscaped yard and off-street parking is sure to impress.
All of this is within walking distance to Lansell Square, public transport, Kangaroo Flat shops, schools and a short drive to Bendigo CBD.
Call today to arrange an inspection!

Description:
IMMACULATE LIVING AT ITS BEST
Set in a quiet court location is this beautifully maintained property. There's absolutely nothing to be done here, just move in and relax. The home features main bedroom with ensuite, ducted evap cooling, spacious lounge with gas heating, spotless kitchen with stainless steel stove and dishwasher. Optional fourth bedroom/office accessed from the covered deck at the rear which is ideal for entertaining. You will also find lovely gardens, double carport and garage/workshop with concrete floor and power at the rear. Potential energy savings from a solar panel system. This lovely home will suit a wide range of buyers. Inspection highly recommended.
Note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS

Description:
PERFECT FIRST HOME
If you are searching for your first home and something solid, on a great sized allotment and proximity to all Kangaroo Flat has to offer is preferable! Then this solid brick veneer home is the perfect. Equally suited for retirees and investors alike.
Walking distance to schools, public transport and shops.
Situated on a 832m2 (approx.) corner allotment this home boasts 3 bedrooms, master bedroom is of a good size with built in robes. .
The generous sized kitchen has copious amounts of bench and cupboard space, upgraded with stylish bamboo flooring .The living area has new carpet and a fresh paint throughout. A central three piece bathroom and separate toilet.
Also the benefit of a full upgrade of the insulation and a split system heating a cooling unit helps provide year round comfort.
Outside there is a 9m x 4.5m undercover area off the kitchen, making it perfect for entertaining. The private, neat landscaped backyard is secured with new colourbond fencing and side access. 3m x 3m garden shed plus a 3.6m x 4.5m workshop powered with 15 amp power. Double undercover carport with an asphalted driveway.
Be quick and call today for your personal inspection.

Description:
Property with potential every which way.
This property has potential written all over it. It's a win–win situation whichever way you look at it.
First is the location - a quiet no-through street close to schools, supermarket, High Street shopping, the soon-to-be new pool, parklands, sporting facilities and public transport.
Second - the level block measures approximately 1,090 square metres.
Third - the three bedroom home has recently gone a total makeover with new kitchen and bathroom featuring new vanity unit, shower and modern tiles. Find a split system air conditioning and polished timber floors throughout the kitchen, adjoining dining area, front lounge and entry hall with new carpets in the bedrooms. A spacious, separately located family living room includes big windows overlooking the back yard, gas wall furnace and ceiling fan. The house is in great shape and ready for immediate occupation.
But there's more - a fully self-contained unit in the backyard includes bedroom with ensuite, living area and kitchenette. It is in need of some TLC to bring it up to scratch, but it does have options – restore for extended family, lease out for extra income or sell off as a relocatable and develop the site which has no heritage or planning overlays (STCA).
Call today for more details.

Description:
CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS MUST SELL!
After recent discussions with the vendor, they've indicated that the property must sell. The vendors have advised that there is the opportunity for the furniture to also be sold with the property (approx $20,000). Whilst they have acknowledged that there are multiple homes on the market, wanted to highlight the below points;
- Eco friendly heable brick home with wool insulation for comfort in the warmer and cooler months
- Large study that could be used as a fifth bedroom or rumpus room
- Newly renovated kitchen with modern appliances including dishwasher and gas stove top
- Zoned ducted gas heating and refridegerated cooling throughout
If this property is of interest, please feel free to make contact with our office to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Perfect Family Home or Investment
Spacious and bright living, loads of extras outdoors plus a handy position are just 3 of the many reasons to make this property the next to inspect. A unique 3-bedroom floorplan offers a refreshingly sensible design, where rooms flow naturally with the rhythm of family life. Ducted evaporative cooling, gas heaters along with reverse cycle air conditioning provide efficient and effective year round comfort.
Flanked by 2 living areas and adjoining the dining room, the kitchen possesses a gas stove and wall oven plus a double door pantry. Loads of bench-space separates an abundance of cupboards. Further storage found elsewhere includes twin linen presses, built-in robes in 2 bedrooms and walk-in robe to the main bedroom which also has an ensuite. Just off the family room, the undercover alfresco living soaks up winter sunshine from a north-easterly aspect.
A generous block size of 837m2 and corner positioning grants bonus side access from Paula Court to the fully fenced backyard.
This enables choice of vehicle entry into the 4 x 7.5 metre shed with concrete floor and power, garage and carport, handy for secure shelter of not just cars but also a caravan, boat and/or trailer. Adjoining the residence, the garage has a remote-controlled roller door, direct entry indoors via the laundry and a huge workshop space which provides plenty of room for hobbies too.
Commuters can catch the train or drive to Melbourne.
Schools, amenities, shopping, buses and services are all nearby this fab location. So whether investing, finding a first home or a forever home this property certainly has mass appeal.
Insights: 6 O'Dea Crescent, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT STREET APPEAL!!
Perched up high at the end of Gledhill Rise, is this very spacious four-bedroom, family home that has plenty of space for the family to spread out with three living areas! With primary & secondary schools within walking distance, a short commute to shops, sporting facilities, the new Aquatic Centre (opening in 2018) and Bendigo CBD, the location is excellent too!
Stepping into the home, to the left is the master bedroom with built in robes, split system, ceiling fan and access to the two way bathroom which has shower, bath, vanity and a separate toilet. To the right is the formal lounge or parents retreat. Further on is the heart of the home which includes kitchen with gas wall oven and cook top, dishwasher, corner pantry, large fridge space, plenty of cupboards & bench space, all in excellent order. The dining space is adjacent with enough room for a family sized table. The second lounge is located nearby, with built in bar, two door built in robe for storage and split system. This would be a great room for a pool table or a casual zone for watching your favorite TV shows.
Moving upstairs there are three good sized bedrooms, all with built in robes and ceiling fans, a second bathroom with shower, vanity, toilet plus a third living area with another split system. This is a fantastic kids zone where they can have their very own bathroom and lounge area to chill out. Other notable internal features are ducted gas heating, decorative cornice, security screens on the windows and great storage.
Stepping outside from the dining area, you are greeted by a superb paved & roofed alfresco/entertaining area that can be used all year round thanks to the pull down bistro blinds. This is a large area and perfect for family BBQ's or your next social gathering. The backyard has a grassed area plus numerous shrubs, fruit trees, two garden sheds for storing the garden tools, water tank with pump for watering the garden and secure fencing.
For the car accommodation, there is a two-car carport that has a clearance height of 2.4 metres, high enough to store the caravan or 4-wheel drive. All this on a 800Sqm manageable block.
An excellent family home, with great street appeal, in a sought after quiet location. Vacant possession and quick settlement is available. Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Classic Clinker in Prime Position
Positioned on a beautiful tree-lined service road, this original 1950s clinker brick home occupies a 630sqm (approx.) allotment among other desirable homes in a fantastic location. If you're seeking a property within walking distance to all amenities including bus and train services, doctors, schools, sporting complexes, parks and entertainment, then you could not be in a better spot on the Melbourne side of Bendigo. There are also further opportunities to renovate or extend the home (STCA).
Architecturally, this structure is very solid and the interior is well maintained and spotless. A fantastic job has been done in combining old and new to attractively rejuvenate the home, creating an inviting space.
Some of the benefits of the renovation include; a fresh coat of paint, new window furnishings and new floor coverings in the kitchen, meals and laundry area.
As you enter the home you'll be impressed with the well-designed layout; kitchen, meals, laundry and living space to the right, with bedrooms and family bathroom to the left. The kitchen is bright and welcoming and offers ample bench space and cupboard storage. There is a 4-burner gas cooktop, an electric wall oven and a dishwasher. The laundry is conveniently located just off the kitchen and has plenty of bench and cupboard space. The living room is a generous size and has a beautiful big window that keeps the space well lit and offers views to the front garden.
The 3 bedrooms are also quite spacious; one having a BIR and the remaining rooms have sufficient space for either freestanding robes or BIRs to be added. The 3 piece family bathroom is quite roomy and consists of a large 900x1200ml shower, updated vanity and toilet. The bathroom is certainly wheelchair friendly, as is the rest of house. Heating and cooling is easily controlled year round with ducted gas heating and evaporative air conditioning. The combination of 9ft ceilings and ceiling fans in kitchen/dining area and first bedroom make a dramatic reduction to summer temperatures, even without the air conditioner. There is also a gas heater in the original fireplace in the living room.
There are lovely established hedges and trees in the front garden, concrete driveway and paths, pergola area, single brick garage with entry to separate workshop and garden shed.
This property is ideal for a family to occupy, first home buyers or an investor looking to grow their portfolio. Don't delay inspection of this stunning property.
